original_text: Peter said to her, ‘It was wrong for you and your husband to do this bad thing. You agreed together to tell a lie to the Holy Spirit of the Lord God. Listen! The men who have just buried your husband are at the door again now. They will carry your body out too.’
korean_text: 베드로가 이르되 너희가 어찌 함께 꾀하여 주의 영을 시험하려 하느냐 보라 네 남편을 장사하고 오는 사람들의 발이 문 앞에 이르렀으니 또 너를 메어 내가리라 하니

sentences.original_text: It was wrong for you and your husband to do this bad thing
sentences.korean_translation: 당신과 당신의 남편이 이 악한 일을 하는 것은 잘못되었습니다

sentences.original_text: You agreed together to tell a lie
to tell a lie to the Holy Spirit of the Lord God
The men who have just buried your husband
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 남편을 방금 장사 지낸 사람들이

sentences.original_text: are at the door again now
They will carry your body out too
sentences.korean_translation: 그들도 당신의 시체를 끌고 갈 것입니다
